Good people

Our team

Spring is made up of awesome people who have done wildly impressive things at companies and organizations including Google, eBay, R/GA, Gilt, Marc Jacobs, Bloomberg, Bitly, BlackRock, Lockheed Martin, BeachMint, MIT, Fab, and NYC City Hall. This diverse background translates into an office and work vibe that is a lively mix of product, fashion, tech, ecommerce, and design.
